import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { createPageUrl } from "@/utils"; export default function Guide() { const [selectedTopic, setSelectedTopic] = useState(null); const guideTopics = [ { id: "basics", title: "RICE BASICS", icon: "üìö", content: [ "RICE TO WATER RATIOS:", "‚Ä¢ SHORT GRAIN: 1:1.25", "‚Ä¢ MEDIUM GRAIN: 1:1.5", "‚Ä¢ LONG GRAIN: 1:1.75", "‚Ä¢ BROWN RICE: +25% WATER", "", "GENERAL RULE:", "75G RICE = 1 SERVING", "150G RICE = 2-3 SERVINGS", "300G RICE = FAMILY SIZE" ] }, { id: "troubleshooting", title: "TROUBLESHOOTING", icon: "üîß", content: [ "RICE TOO STICKY/MUSHY:", "‚Ä¢ USE 10% LESS WATER", "‚Ä¢ RINSE RICE MORE THOROUGHLY", "‚Ä¢ REDUCE COOKING TIME", "", "RICE TOO DRY/HARD:", "‚Ä¢ ADD 2-3 TBSP HOT WATER", "‚Ä¢ COOK 2-3 MINUTES MORE", "‚Ä¢ INCREASE WATER NEXT TIME", "", "RICE BURNT ON BOTTOM:", "‚Ä¢ LOWER HEAT SETTING", "‚Ä¢ USE HEAVIER POT", "‚Ä¢ DON'T LIFT LID TOO EARLY" ] }, { id: "types", title: "RICE VARIETIES", icon: "üåæ", content: [ "JASMINE RICE:", "‚Ä¢ AROMATIC, SLIGHTLY STICKY", "‚Ä¢ GREAT FOR ASIAN DISHES", "‚Ä¢ COOK TIME: 18 MINUTES", "", "BASMATI RICE:", "‚Ä¢ LONG GRAIN, FLUFFY", "‚Ä¢ PERFECT FOR CURRY", "‚Ä¢ COOK TIME: 15 MINUTES", "", "ARBORIO RICE:", "‚Ä¢ SHORT GRAIN, CREAMY", "‚Ä¢ IDEAL FOR RISOTTO", "‚Ä¢ COOK TIME: 20 MINUTES", "", "WILD RICE:", "‚Ä¢ NUTTY FLAVOR, CHEWY", "‚Ä¢ TAKES LONGER TO COOK", "‚Ä¢ COOK TIME: 45 MINUTES" ] }, { id: "tips", title: "PRO TIPS", icon: "üí°", content: [ "BEFORE COOKING:", "‚Ä¢ RINSE RICE 2-3 TIMES", "‚Ä¢ SOAK BASMATI 15 MINUTES", "‚Ä¢ USE HEAVY-BOTTOMED POT", "", "DURING COOKING:", "‚Ä¢ NEVER LIFT THE LID", "‚Ä¢ KEEP HEAT CONSISTENT", "‚Ä¢ DON'T STIR THE RICE", "", "AFTER COOKING:", "‚Ä¢ LET REST 5-10 MINUTES", "‚Ä¢ FLUFF WITH FORK", "‚Ä¢ SERVE IMMEDIATELY", "", "STORAGE:", "‚Ä¢ REFRIGERATE UP TO 5 DAYS", "‚Ä¢ FREEZE UP TO 6 MONTHS", "‚Ä¢ REHEAT WITH DAMP PAPER TOWEL" ] } ]; if (selectedTopic) { const topic = guideTopics.find(t => t.id === selectedTopic); return (
{/* Header */}
{topic.title}
HOME
{/* Topic Icon */}
{topic.icon}
{topic.title}
{/* Content */}
{topic.content.map((line, index) => (
{line}
))}
{/* Quick Actions */}
‚ñ∫ START COOKING
); } return (
{/* Header */}
‚Üê BACK
RICE GUIDE
HELP
{/* Welcome */}
üìñ
RICE COOKING GUIDE
LEARN THE BASICS
{/* Topic List */}
{guideTopics.map((topic) => ( ))}
{/* Quick Tips */}
‚ö° QUICK TIP:
ALWAYS RINSE YOUR RICE UNTIL THE WATER RUNS CLEAR. THIS REMOVES EXCESS STARCH AND PREVENTS STICKY RICE!
{/* Status */}
SELECT TOPIC TO CONTINUE
); }
